name: Truth (IGMC2018)
description:
You appear in a place you don't know, hurt, and with no memories. You have to find out what is going on.

** Short demo developed in 3 weeks for the imgc2018, could be some minor bugs, feedback appreciated! **

Controls:
- AWDS -> Move
- Space -> Dash
- E -> Interact/Dialogs
- Number (1)/ (2) -> Choose one or another option during dialogs.

Credits:
- Art & Animation: https://twitter.com/hugueslaborde https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/
- Programming: https://twitter.com/AngelRDev https://angelrdev.itch.io/
- Music: Yann Imbert and Theo Mamasian.
